name: lighterhtml
description: The hyperHTML strength & experience without its complexity

scripts.build: npm run rollup && npm run es && npm run clean && npm run cjs && npm run min && npm run size
scripts.clean: sed -i.bck -e 's/var isNoOp =.*/var isNoOp = false;/' index.js && sed -i.bck 's/(exports)/(document,exports)/;s/({}));/(document,{}));/' index.js && rm index.js.bck
scripts.es: rollup --config es.config.js && sed -i.bck 's/var /\/*! (c) Andrea Giammarchi - ISC *\/var /' es.js && rm es.js.bck
scripts.min: echo '/*! (c) Andrea Giammarchi - ISC */' > min.js && uglifyjs index.js -c -m >> min.js
scripts.size: cat index.js | wc -c;cat min.js | wc -c;gzip -c9 min.js | wc -c;brotli -c9 min.js | wc -c;cat es.js | wc -c;gzip -c9 es.js | wc -c;brotli -c9 es.js | wc -c

author: Andrea Giammarchi
